description.en: Ultimate Zigbee Hub v1.0.32 - Complete unbranded Zigbee ecosystem with exhaustive enrichment from Johan Bendz, ZHA, Zigbee2MQTT, and community sources. Professional driver collection for 1500+ devices with maxBuffer resolution and enhanced categorization.
